p: A 0.5 g portion of the plant extract was stirred with 5 cm 3 of 1% aqueous HCl on a steam bath. Few drops of picric acid solution were added to 2 cm 3 of the extract. The formation of a reddish brown precipitate was taken as a preliminary evidence for the presence of alkaloids (Harborne 1973; Trease and Evans 1989).
